explains: adj. 不流行的，不受欢迎的

sentences.en: It was a painful and unpopular decision.
sentences.cn: 这是一个痛苦且不受欢迎的决定。

sentences.en: His rigid adherence to the rules made him unpopular.
sentences.cn: 他对规则的刻板坚持使得他不受欢迎。

sentences.en: The state's unpopular sales tax on snacks has ended.
sentences.cn: 该州不得人心的快餐销售税已经取消。
